alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 4:39PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern La Paz County through 515 PM MST... At 439 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brenda, or 33 miles southeast of Parker. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern La Paz County. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 37 and 43. AZ Route 72 between mile markers 36 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
